arabic.title: أخر ميعاد
text: ساعات البعد بينسى و ساعات يتعب
ياريت لو صدفه نتقابل ما تسألنيش
عشان مع أنى بتعذب أكيد حكدب
وأقولك عادى كله تمام أدينى بعيش
وابين عكس إحساسى اللى حاسس بيه
أنا أخر معاد بينا ده أخر يوم أنا عشته
وأخر مره فيها ضحكت كانت وياك
أنا ما بقتش مستنى فى يوم نرجع
لكن بسأل عشان أنساك طب أعمل أيه
اللى بينسى حب قديم بينسى إزاى
مافيش نسيان عشان فى حاجات كتير تمنع
ووقت الجد أنا بضعف و تعرف ليه
عشان صدقنى أنا بطبيعتى مش نساى
أنا أخر معاد بينا ده أخر يوم أنا عشته
وأخر مره فيها ضحكت كانت وياك

english.title: Last Time We Met
text: Sometimes distance makes you forget; sometimes it makes you weary
I wish we'd meet coincidentally; don't ask me
how I am doing in your absence
Because, although I am tortured, surely I will lie
And tell you, I'm normal, everything's alright, here I am, living on
And I would show the opposite of what I'm feeling
Last time we met was the last day I lived
And since then life has stopped
And the last time I laughed was with you
I am no longer waiting for us to return one day
But I'm asking: What should I do to forget you?
He who forgets his old love, how does he do it?
There's no forgetting as there are many things that prevent that
And when it gets serious I get weak, you know why?
Because, believe me, I'm not someone inclined to forget
Last time we met was the last day I lived
And since then life has stopped
And the last time I laughed was with you

arabic.title: إضحكى
text: ياللى شمس الدنيا تطلع لما تطلع ضحكة منك
حسى بالناس الغلابه اللى زيى بعد إذنك
مستحيل الشعر يوصف أى تفصيلة فى جمالك
والغنى لو كان كفاية ألف غنوه أغنيهالك
ياللى شمس الدنيا تطلع لما تطلع ضحكة منك
حسى بالناس الغلابه اللى زيى بعد إذنك

english.title: Laugh
text: The sun rises when a laugh escapes you
Sense the (feelings of the) poor, like myself, if you please
And never let your face frown
You are really way ahead of your age1
How much I love you, my soul
It is impossible for poetry to describe a single detail of your beauty
And if singing was enough, I would sing you a thousand songs
When you are by my side
I forget with you all my weariness
My heart is happy with your occupation (of it)
How much I love you, my soul
The sun rises when a laugh escapes you
Sense the (feelings of the) poor, like myself, if you please
And never let your face frown
You are really way ahead of your age
How much I love you, my soul

arabic.title: احنا مش بتوع حداد
text: وافتح جميع كُتب التاريخ وأكتب و قول
ضحك العريس علشان عرف اليوم شهادته أكيد ينول
أحنا صخر ميتكسرش و كل ضربة يزيد ثبات
منسى ١٠٠ مليون يموتوا والبلد دى ماتنحنيش
أحنا صخر مايتكسرش و كل ضربة يزيد ثبات
منسى ١٠٠ مليون يموتوا والبلد دى ماتنحنيش
أحنا صخر مايتكسرش و كل ضربة يزيد ثبات
منسى ١٠٠ مليون يموتوا والبلد دى ماتنحنيش
و البلد دى عايزة منسى مستحيل ييأس فى يوم
كل منسى فيكو لازم يبقى ليها سند وضهر
أحنا صخر مايتكسرش و كل ضربة يزيد ثبات
منسى ١٠٠ مليون يموتوا والبلد دى ماتنحنيش

منسى ١٠٠ مليون يموتوا والبلد دى ماتنحنيش
منسى ١٠٠ مليون يموتوا والبلد دى ماتنحنيش
أحنا صخر مايتكسرش و كل ضربة يزيد ثبات
منسى ١٠٠ مليون يموتوا والبلد دى ماتنحنيش
أحنا صخر مايتكسرش و كل ضربة يزيد ثبات
منسى ١٠٠ مليون يموتوا والبلد دى ماتنحنيش

english.title: We are not mourning kind of people
text: Open all history books and write down
About heroes, who love their land,
Who willingly give up their lives leaving all wondering about them
Silence is all around.. dawn and adhan1
Homeland called them up and they responded to the call
The groom is smiling, knowing that today he becomes a martyr3
We are not mourning kind of people4
We are embers, burning under ashes
We are unbreakable rocks, growing much harder with every hit
I've nothing else other than my land
"Mansy" is a 100 million6 ready to die before letting this land kneel
Boys are in love with its earth
For those who stayed and for those who left
All who think to be enemy
Your flag, oh, Land of mine!, will wrap my coffin
At last I was destined by God for that
We are not mourning kind of people
We are embers, burning under ashes
We are unbreakable rocks, growing much harder with every hit
I've nothing else other than my land
"Mansy" is a 100 million ready to die before letting this land kneel
We are not mourning kind of people
We are embers, burning under ashes
We are unbreakable rocks, growing much harder with every hit
I've nothing else other than my land
"Mansy" is a 100 million ready to die before letting this land kneel
We are not mourning kind of people
We are embers, burning under ashes
We are unbreakable rocks, growing much harder with every hit
I've nothing else other than my land
"Mansy" is a 100 million ready to die before letting this land kneel

We are embers, burning under ashes
We are unbreakable rocks, growing much harder with every hit
I've nothing else other than my land
"Mansy" is a 100 million ready to die before letting this land kneel

We are embers, burning under ashes
We are unbreakable rocks, growing much harder with every hit
I've nothing else other than my land
"Mansy" is a 100 million ready to die before letting this land kneel

We are embers, burning under ashes
We are unbreakable rocks, growing much harder with every hit
I've nothing else other than my land
"Mansy" is a 100 million ready to die before letting this land kneel
We are not mourning kind of people
We are embers, burning under ashes
We are unbreakable rocks, growing much harder with every hit
I've nothing else other than my land
"Mansy" is a 100 million ready to die before letting this land kneel

arabic.title: النسيان
text: هنخسر بعض إيه يعني منخسر بعض
هاعيش وتعيش ونتعود كمان ع البعد
ومين قال الحياة أصلاً تقف على حد
ما فيش في الدنيا دي حاجة ما تتعوضش
حاجات رايحة وحاجات جاية فمش ندمان
وبرضه مفيش كمان حاجة اسمها ما نقدرش
أنا اتعودت أعيش عادي في أي ظروف
لا بعرف يأس ولا بضعف ولا أعرف خوف
ما جتش عليك ما هيش فارقة معايا كتير
ف عادي بقول هنخسر بعض مش مكسوف

english.title: Oblivion
text: We will lose each other. So what?
I will live and you live and we will get used to being apart
my life won't be affected and I'm not losing anything
and who said that life stops for anyone?
there's nothing in this life that's irreplaceable
things come and this go, that's why I have no regrets
also, there's no such thing as impossible
and oblivion is a grace from God
I'm used to living normally under any circumstances
I know no surrender, no weakness and no fear
so you don't make any difference to m3
for that, it's okay, I will say that we are losing each other without any shame

arabic.title: بطلنا اللي يعطلنا
text: بطلنا اللي يعطلنا ودعنا اللي بيوجعنا
قفلنا خلاص وقفلنا وعملنا اللي هينفعنا
أمبارح راح مش راجع وماعادش مجال لرجوع
كل كلامك مش نافع قفل بقى ع الموضوع
بطلنا اللي يعطلنا ودعنا اللي بيوجعنا
قفلنا خلاص وقفلنا وعملنا اللي هينفعنا
أمبارح راح مش راجع وماعادش مجال لرجوع
كل كلامك مش نافع قفل بقى ع الموضوع

english.title: We Abandoned the Ones Who Hold us Back
text: And you've come to beg it to return to you
and you forgot your heart and its actions
And you forgot its wounds by your hands
And you also thought that I will believe you
and you don't know that I have changed
and you don't know that there is a principle
We abandoned the ones who hold us back, bid farewell to the ones who hurt us
We are all done and over now, We did that which benefits us1
Yesterday is gone, it's never coming back, and there is no way for us to get back [together]
All your words are not working, now leave this topic alone
could only work in the past
I've memorized all what you say
Save it then and don't say it
I don't have time for your drama
We abandoned the ones who hold us back, bid farewell to the ones who hurt us
We are all done and over now, We did that which benefits us1
Yesterday is gone, it's never coming back, and there is no way for us to get back [together]
All your words are not working, now leave this topic alone

arabic.title: تحيا مصر
text: قالولي في جملة واضحة حط فيها اسم مصر
جاوبت بحسن نية الجملة هي تحيا مصر
قالولي ارسم عالمها سرحت واتخيلت قصر
عليه حراس كتير في وسطهم خطين ونسر
عروسة لابسة طرحة جاية لينا من بعيد
وحاسبة كل خطوة عارفة هي رايحة فين

english.title: Long Live Egypt
text: They asked me to put the name of Egypt in a clear sentence
I answered in good intention , the sentence is Long live Egypt
They asked me to draw her flag, I thought and imagined a palace
There are many guards around it ,in the midst of them, There are two lines and an eagle
And her eyes are on every side
A bride with a scarf coming to us  from afar
She calculated every step ,She knows where to go
Smiling with joy,  to near and far people
She waves to tomorrow  "Enter ye here in security "
And her eyes are on every side
And her eyes are on every side
And her eyes are on every side

english.title: Take Care
text: For my sake, give yourself a kiss
And who takes care of you after me
Know that you are the reason I’m living
I smell you wherever I go
Your perfume is in every corner of the house
I’ll forget myself when I am next to you
And I won’t excuse you from the moment you leave
For my sake, give yourself a kiss
Oh you, the love of my life and my heart
Oh, you, the reason for my sadness and wounds
Let me eyes get enough of you
I smell you wherever I go
Your perfume is in every corner of the house
I’ll forget myself when I am next to you
And I won’t excuse you from the moment you leave
For my sake, give yourself a kiss
And who takes care of you after me
Know that you are the reason I’m living

arabic.title: عزوبية
text: دا لو أحكي أنا ع اللي فيا

english.title: Bachelorhood
text: The joy of my heart and my eyes
is something that you've drawn for me
Your love is showing on me
my heart is asking what is wrong with me
If I try to describe what is with me
I love you, yes, I will speak out
I will tell you what I've been hiding
Back then I used to wish
For you to pass me by just by chance
And I'd let my eyes tell you
the tale of you and my heart
Sleep will be starting the afternoon
And no more staying up all night
No friends will drop by [to visit me]
I have given myself up for you
You are the only one in my eyes
My heart used to be mine,
in just seconds, it saw you with its eyes

arabic.title: متفوتنيش انا وحدى
text: خلي شوية علي و خلي شوية عليك
ماتخليش الدنيا تلعب بيا و بيك
خلي شوية علي و خلي شوية عليك

english.title: Don't leave me alone
text: وحياتك يا حبيبي ريح قلبي معاك
please my beloved make my heart at ease with you
غلب الحب معاي وتعب الشوق وياك
I was defeated by love,the longing got tired with you
ماتفوتنيش انا وحدي افضل احايل بيك
don't leave me alone,don't let me beg you
ماتخليش الدنيا تلعب بيا و بيك
don't let the world play by you and me
let a little for me and a little for you
اليل بدموعه قاسي ياويلي من سعاته
the night is cruel with its tears,how I suffer from it
والصبر لسه ساكت وياويلي من سكاته
and the patience is still silent,how I suffer from it silence
you promise me with joy and I wiat with my smile
like a rose waits for the dew
and you go away thinking,then you come to me and apologize
فين القلب الي يقدر يستحمل كل ده
how can my heart endure all of this
وارجع تاني اقول لك ريحني الله يخليك
and I come back again to say,make me at ease please
عشان المركب تقدر تمشي بي وبيك
so that the ship can swim with you and me
ماتفوتنيش انا وحدي افضل احايل بيك
ماتخليش الدنيا تلعب بيا و بيك
عمر هوانا بيجري بيجري .. شوف راح منه كام
the life of our passion is running away,see how much passed from it
ساعة شوق ومحبة .. وشهر بعاد وخصام
an hour of love and longing,and a month of distance and dispute
ويبقي الحب تايه .. مش عارف احنا فين
and the love remains lost,not knowing where we are
زي المركب ما تبقي .. محتارة بين شطين
like the ship perplexed between two shores
(until when we remain belved ones but not really in love)

arabic.title: مش كتير
text: قوللى فى وصفك ايه وانا اقول

english.title: Not Too Much
text: Your beauty is not too much for you
Beauty is too little to [describe] you
I painted you the sweetest image
As you were by my side and in front of my eyes
It is not too much for you, darling
You are more precious than my life
When you are by my side, love
Everything in my life becomes sweet
You filled my days with happiness
And I'm exceedingly happy with you
I laugh with all my heart and am happy
I saw with you my most beautiful days
When I slept, I saw you in front of me
I wish time would freeze when I'm with you
My heart is at peace as long as you are with me
I feel all the passion inside of me
I'm silent but my eyes speak
No matter how much I tell tales of your beauty's charm
When my eyes sleep, my heart awakens for you
Tell me what can I say to describe you
Your beauty is not too much for you
It is not too much for you, love
You are more precious than my life
When you are by my side, love
Everything in my life becomes sweet

arabic.title: يا ليالي
text: وانا مش ممكن اعيش من بعدك

english.title: Oh Nights
text: I am ours and you are mine
And the stars of this sky are in our hands
There is no one else here but us
And the third one of us is the longing, my darling
Oh nights, keep us like this
With the fire of longing and our love
Oh nights, my darling is here
There isn’t anything that we are missing
And my eyes brought me to you
And my whole life is with you
And I can’t live if you are gone
Oh nights, keep us like this
With the fire of longing and our love
Oh nights, my darling is here
There isn’t anything that we are missing

arabic.title: يلا نعيش
text: انا عايز احب انا عايز اعيش
الحب ما بينا نظره ابتسامه كلام

english.title: Ahmed Gamal | Yalla Naeesh | English Subtitles
text: a night .. only a night in the life
my life just started this tonight with you
all my life i was telling myself
i want to love ,i want to live
when i saw you l let myself to you
i tried to run from you but its impossible!
love between us are a blink, smile and talk
there are no words in your eyes
just tell me and don't hide your feelings
Tonight Tonight Tonight Tonight  .. lets live
a night .. only a night in the life
my life just started tonight with you
with you i have found all what I've wished and all I've dreamed
first feeling i feel with you love it
i cant find any words describe how much i love you
if i told you it will take long time
i will say what or what
( which mean that many things he want to say )
Tonight Tonight Tonight Tonight  .. lets live
a night .. only a night in the life
my life just started tonight with you
